mapper.select: SELECT bp.id,bp.title,bp.content,bp.create_time,bp.modified_time,bp.user_id,bp.replies_count,bp.type,bp.is_top, bu1.user_name,bu1.credit_degree, bu2.user_name AS last_replier FROM boki_post bp JOIN boki_user bu1 ON bp.user_id = bu1.id JOIN boki_user bu2 ON bp.last_replier_id = bu2.id WHERE bp.is_deleted = 'n' ORDER BY bp.is_top DESC, bp.create_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{end}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM boki_post WHERE is_deleted = 'n'
